mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PRODUCT ( product_no, product_name, brand_id, tech_id, thickness_id, identify_id, manufactor_id, quantity_id, amount, price, create_user_id ) VALUES ( #{productNo}, #{productName}, #{brandId}, #{techId}, #{thicknessId}, #{identifyId}, #{manufactorId}, #{quantityId}, #{amount}, #{price}, #{createUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM t_product product LEFT JOIN t_brand brand ON product.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN t_tech tech ON product.tech_id = tech.id LEFT JOIN t_thickness thickness ON product.thickness_id = thickness.id LEFT JOIN t_manufactor manufactor ON manufactor.id = product.manufactor_id LEFT JOIN t_identify identify ON identify.id = product.identify_id LEFT JOIN t_quantity quantity ON quantity.id = product.quantity_id LEFT JOIN t_user user on user.id = product.create_user_id
